      void execute(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Method for authorization user here we find data in database and if it exists we will log in to the system if not we will get message to sign up in system or if exceptions will occur we will get corresponding message

      • execute

        public void execute(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    javax.servlet.ServletException
        Method for authorization user here we find data in database and if it exists we will log in to the system if not we will get message to sign up in system or if exceptions will occur we will get corresponding message
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Command
        Parameters:
        request - Set error message, and forward if credentials aren't correct, redirect to main page set role username when credentials are correct and logging and forward to authentication page if credentials aren't correct
        response -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        See Also:
        RoleChecker.getRole(User), ServiceProvider.getInstance(), ServiceProvider.getClientService(), ClientService.authorization(String, String)
